jobs_results.title: Lead Developer Mobile Apps (iOS / Android) for Digital Health - Consulting
jobs_results.description:
At EY, you‚Äôll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we‚Äôre counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

You will be part of EY‚Äôs EMEIA-based Digital Health Excellence Center (DHEC). Our mission is to improve health outcomes and patient experiences. As the DHEC, we bring our expert knowledge and delivery power to industry-leading healthcare providers in collaboration with the local firms.

The opportunity

As a senior developer, you will work alongside a team of international experts in technology, business and the healthcare industry. The end-to-end development and implementation of mobile apps is at the core of the DHEC, with you we want to further strengthen our technical expertise.

Your key responsibilities

As a senior developer, you are responsible for the development and implementation of innovative mobile software solutions for our healthcare clients. In your role, you will collaborate with clinical teams, administrators, and other healthcare professionals to prioritize and address health-specific software needs.

As technical expert, you work together with the development team in the creation of customer journey and user stories, you coordinate with UI/UX designers, and you collaborate with the software architects to implement functionality that is suitable for specific client needs. Additionally, you will be responsible for near- and off-shore technical teams, vendors, and external partners to ensure our products are consistent and reliable, as well as provide training and support in business development.

Skills and attributes for success
‚Ä¢ Strong written and verbal communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills for both technical and business audiences.
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English and Proficiency in the local language of your country of residence is required.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of additional languages will be appreciated.
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work under tight timelines for multiple project deliveries in parallel.
‚Ä¢ Ability/flexibility to travel.

To qualify for the role, you must have
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in informatics, Mathematics, (Software) Engineering or other related field with strong IT focus. Master's or further certification are advantageous.
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 2 years of working experience in a healthcare context and particular focus on implementing custom applications on mobile operating systems.
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of development in iOS and Android using e.g. Swift, SwiftUI, Kotlin, and Jetpack Compose. Basic understanding of both operating systems is a prerequisite.
‚Ä¢ Expert knowledge of software architecture on all levels, i.e. network, infrastructure, security, persistence, application, and frontend.
‚Ä¢ Proven work experience in driving international development teams and managing different stakeholder groups, e.g. project managers, Scrum masters, product owners, business analysts, developers, and infrastructure and security architects.
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of programming patterns (e.g. MVC, MVVM), tools, and frameworks for development (e.g. Declarative UI, Angular, Xamarin, React).

Ideally, you‚Äôll also have
‚Ä¢ A reliable network in the healthcare industry and a consulting track record.
‚Ä¢ A good overview of industry technology trends and emerging technologies, understand how they apply to our healthcare clients and can drive their adoption into our projects.
‚Ä¢ A solid understanding of health-specific interoperability formats, e.g. HL7/FHIR, SNOMED, OMOP, openEHR.
‚Ä¢ A good knowledge of system integration in medical system landscapes between software products of various clinical domains, e.g. Electronic Medical Records (EMR), Clinical Information Systems (CIS), Clinical Data Repositories (CDR), Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS), communication servers and interoperability platforms.

What we look for

We are looking for an experienced Senior Developer with strong technical skills and a proven track record working in a healthcare context.

What working at EY offers

As part of this role, you'll work in a highly integrated, global team with the opportunity and tools to grow, develop and drive your career forward. Here, you can combine global opportunity with flexible working. The EY benefits package goes above and beyond too, focusing on your physical, emotional, financial and social well-being. Your recruiter can talk to you about the benefits available in your country.

Here‚Äôs a snapshot of what we offer:
‚Ä¢ Continuous learning: You‚Äôll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
‚Ä¢ Success as defined by you: We‚Äôll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
‚Ä¢ Transformative leadership: We‚Äôll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
‚Ä¢ Diverse and inclusive culture: You‚Äôll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.

About EY

If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

EY | Building a better working world

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

DHEC_FY25

jobs_results.title: Mid-Level Software Engineer - Mobile Applications (Swift & Kotlin)
jobs_results.description:
Who we are

At Moveo.AI, we‚Äôre creating exceptional conversational AI experiences that engage millions of users worldwide. Our mission is to merge leading-edge technology with authentic human interaction, and we‚Äôre proud to collaborate with top-tier partners such as Kaizen Gaming, Skroutz, and Allianz European Reliance.

Join our innovative team of skilled professionals as we push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible in the tech industry. If you‚Äôre passionate about mobile application development and excited to contribute to game-changing projects, we want to hear from you!
About the role

We are looking for a Mid-Level Software Engineer with proficiency in mobile app development, specifically in Swift and/or Kotlin. In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain high-quality mobile applications/SDK that provide seamless user experiences.

Your expertise in mobile technologies will help us create robust, reliable applications that resonate with our customers. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to be part of a dynamic team, this is the perfect opportunity for you!

Join us if you are excited to
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for both iOS (using Swift) and/or Android (using Kotlin) platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and ensure adherence to coding best practices.
‚Ä¢ Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on optimization, continuous delivery, and improvement.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with the latest industry trends and advancements in mobile technology.
What you bring to the team
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in mobile application development with a focus on Swift for iOS or Kotlin for Android.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in building and deploying mobile applications on the App Store and Google Play.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of mobile development paradigms, design patterns, and lifecycle management.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries integration.
‚Ä¢ Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
‚Ä¢ A portfolio of relevant mobile applications or projects showcasing your skills is a plus.

Why You‚Äôll Love Working at Moveo.ai
‚Ä¢ üèÉ A buddy will support you with your onboarding
‚Ä¢ üí∏ Competitive salary package
‚Ä¢ üìö Learning budget for ongoing education
‚Ä¢ ‚≠ê Clear career paths & growth opportunities
‚Ä¢ Join us, not just for a job, but for a thriving journey!

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

For one our prestigious international clients in Greece, we are currently looking for a iOS Developer to join our global project and redefine the boundaries of innovation!

Details:

Role: iOS Developer

Location will be Remote work(only from Greece)

Workload: Full-time

Start: 09/09/2024

End date : 01/08/2025

Scope of work:

As a Senior Application Developer in the Software Engineering group, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining an iOS application.

Your day-to-day activities will include collaborating with cross-functional teams, designing and implementing application features, and ensuring the application meets quality standards.

Design and develop high-quality iOS applications.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize application features.

Ensure the application meets quality standards through testing and troubleshooting.

Maintain and update existing applications.

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in Apple iOS Application Development to improve the application.

Skills:

iOS application developer should have experience in Swift, rxSwift, uiKit, Apple iOS application development, build management

At least 4 years experience.

jobs_results.title: Intermediate Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Intermediate Mobile Developer to join our dynamic development team. As an Intermediate Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for our company. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality mobile solutions that meet business requirements and enhance the user experience. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of innovative mobile applications and grow your skills in a collaborative environment.

Responsibilities

‚óè Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and usability.

‚óè Collaborate with the rest of the team to understand requirements, identify technical solutions, and translate them into well-designed mobile applications.

‚óè Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards.

‚óè Conduct thorough testing and debugging of mobile applications to ensure they meet quality standards and address any defects or issues.

‚óè Integrate mobile applications with backend services and third-party APIs to enable seamless functionality and data synchronization.

‚óè Optimize mobile applications for performance, scalability, and security.

‚óè Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development and propose innovative solutions to improve the mobile development process.

‚óè Collaborate with the team to identify and resolve technical challenges, provide technical guidance, and share knowledge and best practices.

‚óè Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to development standards.

‚óè Assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues reported by users or the support team.

‚óè Document technical specifications, processes, and procedures related to mobile application development.

Requirements

‚óè Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

‚óè Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Objective-C, Java, or Kotlin.

‚óè Strong knowledge of mobile application development frameworks and tools (e.g., Xcode, Android Studio).

‚óè Knowledge of hybrid mobile app development using web technologies (Progressive Web App)

‚óè Experience with cross-platform development frameworks such as React Native, Xamarin, or Flutter.

‚óè Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and ability to translate design specifications into functional applications.

‚óè Experience with APIs, web services integration, and working with backend technologies.

‚óè Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.

‚óè Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following coding standards and best practices.

‚óè Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.

‚óè Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.

‚óè Self-motivated with a strong desire to learn and stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development.

Desired (will be considered as a plus)

‚óè Familiarity with backend development languages (e.g., Java).

‚óè Familiarity with OOP design principles and data structures

‚óè Understanding mobile security best practices and techniques.

‚óè Experience with automated testing frameworks and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

Personal Skills We Are Looking For

‚óè Fluency in Greek and English (written and spoken)

‚óè Strong communication and collaboration abilities.

‚óè Excellent analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting abilities

‚óè Ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.

‚óè Solid organizational skills and focus on accuracy and attention to detail

‚óè Detail oriented, maintaining the highest quality work standards

‚óè Enjoy working within agile/scrum-based team

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer, Mobile Banking

Project overview: The project aims to work on modern mobile banking that allows to manage accounts, make transfers, and pay bills on the go.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Mobile Application Developer - React Native
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
‚Ä¢ Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
‚Ä¢ Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.
‚Ä¢ Reach out to the open source community to encourage and help implement mission-critical software fixes‚ÄîReact Native moves fast and often breaks things.
‚Ä¢ Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
‚Ä¢ Transition existing React web apps to React Native.

Skills
‚Ä¢ Working Knowledge In React Native
‚Ä¢ Firm grasp of the JavaScript, TypeScript language, and its nuances, including ES6+ syntax
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of object-oriented programming
‚Ä¢ Ability to write well-documented, clean Javascript code
‚Ä¢ Rock solid at working with third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle, Android Studio, IntelliJ
‚Ä¢ Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Mobile Developer with experience in Flutter to build high-quality mobile applications. The ideal candidate should be proficient in developing cross-platform applications that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android. You will work closely with our product and design teams to create engaging and efficient user interfaces, ensuring smooth and reliable performance.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop, test, and deploy high-quality mobile applications using Flutter for both iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement modern and intuitive designs.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications for performance, speed, and scalability.
‚Ä¢ Integrate third-party libraries and APIs to extend the functionality of the applications.
‚Ä¢ Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and Flutter updates to continuously improve your skills.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to peers to maintain high code quality.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in an agile environment with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and other developers.
‚Ä¢ Ensure that applications follow security and data protection best practices.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience as a Mobile Developer with strong knowledge of Flutter.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of Dart programming language.
‚Ä¢ Experience with both Android and iOS mobile platforms.
‚Ä¢ Experience with integrating RESTful APIs and working with third-party libraries.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile app performance optimization techniques.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: 2,000.00‚Ç¨ - 4,000.00‚Ç¨ per month

Experience:
‚Ä¢ Flutter: 2 years (Required)
‚Ä¢ Mobile Developer: 2 years (Required)

Application Deadline: 06/01/2025

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Greece

On behalf of our client, a global leader in the production and distribution of a wide range of established nutritional supplements and cosmetic products, we are seeking experienced Flutter Developer to join their new IT Hub in Greece. The company's headquarters are located in Germany, with a subsidiary in Athens, and the IT teams work fully remotely from anywhere in Greece.

A day in the life of a 'Flutter Developer'

The company has developed two internal products: a web and a mobile application, through which it manages all its internal processes while also supporting its partner network, which consists of approximately 3,000 partners. The web application is built using Java/Spring Boot microservices and Angular, while the mobile application is developed with GO and Flutter, supporting both Android and iOS platforms. Based on your expertise in using Flutter, you will join one of the sub-teams, contributing to the development of the company‚Äôs products through the conception, design, and implementation of business solutions.

Your day-to-day
‚Ä¢ Conception, design and implementation of business solutions in the area of digital customer solutions for our sales partners
‚Ä¢ Development and support of iOS and Android applications with a high degree of innovation for our partners
‚Ä¢ Strategic planning and implementation of front-end development projects
‚Ä¢ Taking responsibility for the coordination and control of troubleshooting as part of incident management and ensuring the operation of the developed solutions of the developed solutions
‚Ä¢ Use and continuous optimization of agile development processes and corresponding tool stacks
‚Ä¢ Ensuring software quality by implementing unit tests, expanding End2End tests in test automation and the support of integration tests
‚Ä¢ Technical support in requirements management with regard to feasibility analyses, development and further development of systems
‚Ä¢ Designing data models, interfaces and authorization concepts with the system managers and specialist departments
‚Ä¢ Responsibility for results and realization of the desired solutions with a focus on the needs of the customers/stakeholders and compliance with the company processes (business process and data flow via the existing business applications)

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Completed studies in computer science, business informatics or comparable training
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in the conception and development of multi-tier software architectures in the Flutter/Dart environment
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile development for Android and IOS
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in dealing with tools for collaboration in the development team (Git, Jira, Confluence, SonarQube) and automated deployment/integration of applications (CodeMagick, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of common and cloud databases such as Postgres, MySQL, Azure Cosmos DB
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of build management and continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the Microsoft Azure DevOps environment is a plus
‚Ä¢ Basic application-related knowledge of interfaces (REST, sockets) and protocols (AMQP, TCP, UDP) will be considered as an asset

Benefits

What‚Äôs in it for you

You will have the opportunity to work in a motivating and multicultural environment working on a global scale projects and using latest technologies. Additionally, you will enjoy the following benefits:
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration package plus performance related reward
‚Ä¢ Intellectually stimulating work environment
‚Ä¢ Customized training plan
